welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dunfermline, UK! Known for its rich history, charming architecture, and friendly locals, we invite you to immerse yourself in our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and discover the hidden gems of Dunfermline.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Perth Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Perth Airport serves flights to and from various destinations around the world.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leuchars Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dundee Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dundee Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
